llm.feedback:
Your draft meets the 4‑line Up/Down requirement in spirit but violates the strict format and citation placement rules. Each line must contain exactly five fields separated by “|”: **Up/Down | Time window | Driver/Mechanism | What to watch | Probability %**. Remove all citations from the probability field and place them in the driver or watch fields. Also, the driver field should be a concise phrase; avoid long lists of IDs. For the trade/outlook section, you must output a single swing‑trade line (10 fields) or an outlook line, not a multi‑field “Long | …” block. Rewrite the 4 lines as follows (example):

```
Up | 3‑6 mo | Fed September cut + steepening 2‑yr/10‑yr spread (B1KYJ1GPU)(XTQIQRP5K)(NIT6JFIQF)(FAN5RYW6T)(Z7O1DCHS7) | Fed minutes, CPI, 2‑yr/10‑yr spread (B1KYJ1GPU)(Z7O1DCHS7) | 86%
Up | 3‑6 mo | Fed cut + CPI < 2.5% + strong labor market (B1KYJ1GPU)(XTQIQRP5K)(7XH2DKEKV) | CPI, NFP, PCE (B1KYJ1GPU)(7XH2DKEKV) | 70%
Down | 3‑6 mo | Fed hike or no cut + persistent inflation (LF0UUL917)(B1KYJ1GPU)(7XH2DKEKV) | Fed minutes, CPI, PCE (LF0UUL917)(B1KYJ1GPU)(7XH2DKEKV) | 14%
Down | 3‑6 mo | Fed cut but tariffs roll back + risk premium shift (B1KYJ1GPU) | Tariff announcements, trade data (B1KYJ1GPU) | 10%
```

Then provide a single swing‑trade line for the DXY:

```
Long | 3‑6 mo | 95.8 | 94.5 | 97.5 | 1.3 | Fed hike or CPI > 3% (LF0UUL917)(7XH2DKEKV) | Fed minutes confirm cut (XTQIQRP5K) | 86% | 80
```

Ensure no extraneous text, keep the asset focus on DXY, and keep citations only where you assert specific facts or numbers. This will satisfy the format, citation, and asset‑focus constraints.
